title: Sampler, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted satin, double running, wrapped bars, and stem stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Geometric and floral forms arranged in cross borders; the central one shows symbols of religious significance and the words "Viva Dona Antonia Dias."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted satin, double running, wrapped bars, and stem stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-1.
